title: Senior Business Development Manager

description:
Do you want to work at the forefront of an innovative market research company? We are searching for smart and creative talent to join our team.

What We’re About:

We hire great people from a wide variety of backgrounds, not just because it’s the right thing to do, but because it makes our company stronger. We believe that diversity and inclusion among our teammates is critical to our success, and we seek to recruit, develop and retain the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool.

The Senior Manager, Business Development will be responsible for prospecting and gathering thoughtful and strategic proposals for clients as well as leveraging business and industry knowledge to lead their team to success. The role will require managing a pipeline of new prospects for Innovate MR and tracking the progress through HubSpot and Edge tools. This position will oversee proper management of client life cycle from first job through first 24 months. This individual will ensure a successful transition through Client Development team. This position will assist with any other sales initiatives as the AVP deems appropriate. Inter-departmental coordination will be required to help accomplish these objectives, while maintaining strict organization & quality standards.

About the Role

What You’ll Do:
• Generate new revenue and win rates through prospecting and cultivating clients.
• Maintain high margins on projects.
• Consistently demonstrate strong organizational and communication skills.
• Maintain a highly professional rapport with Innovate MR’ s internal and external clients.
• Increase sales through client expansion from new businesses.
• Ensure information is consistent across all systems.
• Create a highly professional rapport with all internal departments.
• Work in conjunction with the Director, Sales Operations & Corporate training to troubleshoot any incorrect accounts and further optimize all internal lists for specific marketing campaigns.
• Ability to travel domestically up to 15% of the time.

Who You Are:
• A minimum of 2 years of demonstrated sales experience in the market research industry or related industry.
• Achieved success with selling qualitative and quantitative work.
• Proven ability to prospect and generate new revenue.
• Must be able to thrive in an entrepreneurial environment.
• Demonstrated strong analytical/problem solving and organizational skills.
• Ability to multi-task while working independently in a challenging environment.
• Strategic thinking, meticulous, flexible, and resourceful.
• Must be able to communicate effectively both verbally and in writing.

What We Offer:

• Supportive Team

• Parental Leave

• Vacation and Sick Time

• Medical/Dental/Vision Insurance

• Long Term/Short Term Disability

• Life Insurance

• Dedicated Volunteer Day
